availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: W. D. Carpenter (1st Ky Cavalry regiment)

body.p: Joined Union First Kentucky Cavalry in Company G on August 24. Entered as 1st sergeant. Promoted to Adjutant November 14, 1862. Wounded at Knoxville.

bibl.p: Tarrant, Sergeant E., The wild riders of the first Kentucky cavalry : a history of the regiment, in the great war of the rebellion, 1861-1865 : pathetic scenes, amusing incidents, and thrilling episodes, a regimental roster, prison life, adventures, and escapes (New York: New York Public Library, 1894), 393.
